name: Hell Harvest (Astrosaurus)
description:
Description

For some reason, you are sent to the Underworld. However, you make a deal with Hades: if you grow enough crops and collect 1000 Souls, you are set free!

Controls

Move with WASD or the arrow keys. Move through items with left shift and move through possible seeds with tab. Place items and talk to people with space. Return to main menu by pressing escape.

Credits

Tobias Géron: code & design 
Yanti De Visser: art & design
Keran Li: music (soundcloud)

All rights reserved.

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated!
